name: root_dir_check
pattern: {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/root/%/%') OR (fi.path like '/root/%') OR (fi.path like '/root/%/.%')OR (fi.path like '/root/.%'));", "interval": 600, "description": "Lists files and directories under root dir - ATT&CK: T1158,T1100"}
